div.p: Mapping Cross-Cloud Systems: Challenges and Opportunities

Inevitability of cross-cloud computing 25% of enterprises will be deploying [] into some type of hybrid cloud Private cloud is the preferred option for the majority of enterprise workload types, followed closely by hybrid cloud deployments. Cloud Management Platforms, 451 Research, 2014
82% of enterprises have a hybrid cloud strategy, up from 74% in 2014. State of the Cloud Report, RightScale, 2015
Users are running applications in an average of 1.5 public and 1.7 private clouds. State of the Cloud Report, RightScale, 2016
